summary: The diff does not provide direct evidence (within the truncated content) that the specific existing "Mineral Water" item in `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts` was updated to ₹20. The change set also appears to include broader, unrequested modifications such as expanding/rewriting the menu data structure and updating project tracking/summary files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the existing menu item named "Mineral Water" in `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts` so its displayed price reflects an M.R.P. of ₹20 (price badge shows ₹20 in UI and global search results).
missing_requirements.reason: In the provided (truncated) excerpt of `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts`, there is no visible entry for `name: "Mineral Water"`, nor any visible change showing its price set to 20. The `frontend-file-summaries.txt` mentions the change, but that is not the source-of-truth code and does not prove the implementation in the diff excerpt.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims update but is not code)

hallucinated_features.reason: The diff excerpt shows a large menu dataset and new/expanded structure being present in `menuData.ts`, which goes beyond the requested single-item price update and conflicts with the non-goal of no other menu item changes.
evidence: frontend/src/data/menuData.ts (shows many categories/items and structural code beyond a one-line price change)
